title: Cant see Lux's  Q W E R in beta map
body: For the new map, just want to tell the riot staff, when all my computer setting is low, I cant see what Lux is doing, that make s people feel bad ;(

replies.body: I've had no issues with Lux on the new map.  Were they using a skin?
Also Akali shroud once bugged out, couldn't see where her shroud circle. Was very misleading and led to an ally getting pwnED{{item:3070}}

It is entirely possible that this is just a poor computer function on your end because I'm running League on a 2008 Macbook on mac settings and I'm perfectly fine. Just give it time and you'll be able to r{{champion:60}} the QWER combos for the rest of your lives!

Stay positive. Summoner!
The title is beta map not beat map *  ;)
